description: This chocolate bark with peanut butter and banana is the easiest edible gift to make if you're short on time.
name: Peanut Butter & Banana Chocolate Bark Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the dark chocolate in a large bowl in the microwave in 30 second bursts and pour onto a parchment lined baking sheet, smoothing out with a spatula to form a thin layer.
Heat the peanut butter in the microwave for 20 seconds, until runny. Spoon dollops of peanut butter on the chocolate and use a knife to swirl the peanut butter outwards.
Sprinkle over the chopped peanuts and sliced banana. Place in the fridge to set for 1 hour, break into shards and serve.
